fulltext:
Nguyễn Huỳnh Thanh Phương
(Prit)
Date of birth:
 Dec 05th, 1987
Gender:  Female
Phone:  0938.632.132
Email:  pritnguyen@gmail.com
Address:
 Tp.Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
Website:  https://www.facebook.com/PritNguyen
OBJECTIVE
2009 - 2013
Social Sciences and Humanities University
Major: English Linguistics and Literature
2005 - 2008
Academy officials Ho Chi Minh City
Major: Administration - Serectary
I always had scholarship through my studying.
WORK EXPERIENCE
Dec 2019 - Now
iRace.vn
Business Development Manager
Main responsibilities:
- Retain and grow revenue from existing and new clients
- Collaborate with internal teams for creating sales pitches 
- Provide improvement insights on products to deliver measurable
results 
- Campaign Planning and Management 
Partnership: Juno, Aothun.vn, Revie, Pocari, SOS foundation, New
Born Vietnam, Operation Smile...
Sep 2018 - Feb 2019
Zalopay Department - VNG Corp
Business Development Manager
Main responsibilities:
- Training Sale Team (6 members) and Sale Admin. Include:
* Training about Product (Zalopay Apps), System, Communication Skill
* I want my team can upgrade their skills and revenue for business.
- Planning Market Strategy for production. 
- Partnership: MAFC (Mirae Asset Finace Vietnam), Apax Leader, ...
May 2016 - Sep 2018
123Go dept VNG Corp
Senior Business Development
123go.vn is known as one of the big sport platform to provide
registration, payment gateway and timing record system for sport event
in Vietnam. 
Main responsibilities:
1. Sell service (registration, payment and record system) for
Sport/Entertainment Organizers. 
2. Operation Plans for event which we (co)organizer.
3. Reports of sales and finance when project done. 
Our partner: 
- Sunrise Event (orgnizer of Ironman70.3 Vietnam, Techcombank HCM
International Marathon,..)
- Sen Vang Company Ldt (Miss Vietnam 2016)
- D.A.R.E Company (Champion Dash 2015,2016,2017)
* 123Go and MTB Series Company celebrated Dalat Ultra Trail 2018
(Race under Asia Trail Master System).
May 2015 - May 2016
External Affair and Communication - VNG Corp
Communication Executive
- Planning and Execution internal events, include: Year End Party,
Event Team building (The Fire), Quarter Meeting (MC, operation). -
- Leading the internal online news (Click). 
- Working with all divisions in VNG Corp.
Jan 2014 - Feb 2014
The Village Chidren SOS
Member
- Join "The jar of love" project from 2016.
- Find out the corporation to donate this project
ACTIVITIES
Language English
Computer
Word, Excel, Powerpoint
Team Leader
Planning - Training - QC - Teamwork
Business Management
Planning - Action - Check
SKILLS
Mrs.Nguyễn Thị Thanh Lan
Head of South Distribution - Zion Company at VNG
Corp - Zion Compant
Email: lanntt2@vng.com.vn 
Phone: 0843733333
Mr. Russel Kent Johnson 
General Director at Bozoventure Race 
Email: russ@bozoventures.com 
Phone: 0703 987 842
REFERENCES
© topcv.vn
